title: INSTALLING UPDATE
content: My Mozzela VPN says I need an update. When I try Windows asks for permission I click yes, and the update stops/
creator: amjm2000

title: How to keep the focus on the on the already open tab instead of shifting to a new tab opened by the search bar?
content: I keep my address bar and search bar separate. I wanted to have the address bar execute the search on the already open tab, and the search bar to open a new tab in the background without stealing the focus. I managed to set them up separately, now the address bar does not open a new tab and the search bar does, but the newly opened tab always steals the focus. I'm trying to keep the focus on the already open tab while the search bar opens a new tab without switching to it. Is there a way to achieve this?
creator: mostlynothuman

title: Firefox Account Deletion
content: Whenever I try to delete my Firefox Account, it says that my password is incorrect. I've changed my password, copy-pasted it from the password change page and it still says my password is incorrect. How can I fix this? The password works fine for other Firefox things, just not the account deletion page.
creator: saathvikgowda2025
